sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container fluid width="100%">
    <v-row no-gutters d-flex align-center>
        <v-col >
            <v-img width="450" height="500" src="https://picsum.photos/id/237/536/354"></v-img>
        </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>

// SERVICES
import SrvSeries from '@/services/srv-series'

export default {
    name: 'DetailTv',
    data() {
        return {
            dDetailTv: [],
            dIdTv: 0
        }
    },
    props:{
        pIdTv:{
            type: Number,
            required: true,
            default: 0
        }
    },
    created() {
        this.fIniciarVariables()
    },
    methods:{   
        fIniciarVariables(){
            this.dIdTv = this.pIdTv
            this.fGetDetail()
        },
        fGetDetail(){
            let payload = {
                params: {
                    api_key: process.env.VUE_APP_API_KEY_IMAGENES,
                    language: 'es-ES',
                }
            }
            SrvSeries.getDetails(this.dIdTv,payload).then(respuesta => {
                console.log("Respuesta")
                console.log(respuesta)
            })
        }
    }
}
</script>

<style>

</style>
